definitions: Divides or breaks into two or more parts.
Separates into different factions or groups.
Shares or distributes something among several people or groups.
Divides along a line or plane.
Performs a gymnastic feat of sitting on the floor with legs extended in opposite directions.
examples: The company splits its profits among employees.
The atom splits into smaller particles.
She splits her time between two jobs.
The political party splits over the new policy.
